name: WordPress Save To Google Drive
author: Andrea Pernici

sections.description:
Automatically add Google Save To Drive capabilities to your wordpress.

More info:

  • More info on WordPress Save To Google Drive, with info on how to configure it.
  • Check out the other WordPress plugins by the same author, and follow hime on the: SEO Blog.

1.0.1

  • WP 4 Compatibility check

1.0.0

  • Release
sections.installation:
Download, Upgrading, Installation:

Upgrade

  1. First deactivate Save To Drive
  2. Remove the save-to-google-drive directory

Install

  1. Unzip the save-to-google-drive.zip file.
  2. Upload the the save-to-google-drive folder (not just the files in it!) to your wp-contents/plugins folder. If you’re using FTP, use ‘binary’ mode.

Activate

  1. In your WordPress administration, go to the Plugins page
  2. Activate the Save To Google Drive and a subpage for it (Save To Google Drive) will appear in your Options menu.
  3. [apstd datafilename=”My Statement.pdf” datasitename=”My Company Name” datasrc=”/path/to/myfile.pdf”]

If you find any bugs or have any ideas, please mail me.

Advanced Users

For advanced use of the plugin, see the Save To Google Drive page on Andrea
sections.faq: Please before asking question read post and comments here http://www.andreapernici.com/wordpress/save-to-google-drive/
